tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_entries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entry_date DATE,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE fraud_users (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  registration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE fraud_alerts (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  alert_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES fraud_detection_users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    trans_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    suspicious_reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transaction_logs(transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES fraud_detection_users(id)
);
